summary: Experienced software developer with 6+ years in Python development, specializing in web applications, API development, and cloud infrastructure. Proven track record of delivering scalable solutions and mentoring junior developers.

experience.title: Senior Python Developer
experience.description: Led development of microservices architecture using Django and FastAPI. Implemented REST APIs serving 1M+ requests daily. Managed PostgreSQL databases and Redis caching layer. Deployed applications using Docker and Kubernetes on AWS. Integrated with React frontend and implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions. Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews.

experience.title: Python Developer
experience.description: Developed full-stack web applications using Flask and SQLAlchemy. Built REST APIs and integrated with MongoDB for data storage. Deployed applications on AWS using Docker containers and implemented monitoring with Prometheus. Worked with React frontend and implemented authentication using JWT tokens.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: Assisted in developing Python applications and maintaining existing codebase. Worked with Django framework and MySQL databases. Participated in agile development process using Jira. Implemented unit tests and contributed to documentation.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform serving 10K+ users. Implemented payment processing with Stripe API, inventory management, and order tracking. Used Django, React, PostgreSQL, and deployed on AWS with Docker.

projects.name: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: Developed a real-time chat application using FastAPI, WebSockets, and Redis. Implemented user authentication, message persistence, and file sharing. Deployed using Kubernetes on AWS.

projects.name: Data Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Created a data analytics dashboard for business intelligence. Built REST APIs with Flask, integrated with Elasticsearch for search, and implemented data visualization with Chart.js.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
